mapper.select: select cmt_idx, cmt_content, cmt_ip, cmt_regdate, cmt_update, boardNo, userNo, nickName, (select count(*) from Comment_Likes where cmt_idx = c.cmt_idx) as likeCount from Comments c where boardNo = #{boardNo} order by cmt_regdate asc

select * from ( select rownum as no, c.*, (select count(*) from Comment_Likes where cmt_idx = c.cmt_idx) as likeCount from ( select * from Comments where boardNo = #{boardNo} order by cmt_idx desc ) c ) where no between #{start} and #{end}
select nvl(count(*),0) from Comments where boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into Comments ( cmt_idx, cmt_content, cmt_ip, cmt_regdate, cmt_update, boardNo, userNo, nickName ) values ( seq_Comments_idx.nextval, #{cmt_content}, #{cmt_ip}, current_TIMESTAMP, #{cmt_update, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{boardNo}, #{userNo}, #{nickName} )
mapper.update: update Comments set cmt_content = #{cmt_content}, cmt_ip = #{cmt_ip}, cmt_update = current_TIMESTAMP where cmt_idx = #{cmt_idx}
